articles.author: India Today Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Viral pic: Anushka Sharma consoles Virat after India's loss at World Cup final - India Today
articles.description: India who played exceptionally well in the World Cup 2023 final against Australia, lost the match. A vira picture showed the actor who consoled her husband Virat Kohli with a hug.
articles.content: Team India showcased exceptional skills and determination, navigating through a challenging tournament against Australia in the World Cup 2023 final. In a viral picture now, Anushka Sharma can be see… [+1256 chars]
